creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
text:
Jasper imports 'org.apache.jasper.runtime.*' in the java it generates. According
to spec, the only default imports should be "javax.servlet.*",
"javax.servlet.http.*", and "javax.servlet.jsp.*"

Classes from the o.a.j.runtime package should be used via fully qualified names. 

see attached patch (supercedes one posted to tomcat-dev as there's a conflict now)

Created attachment 2981
replaces o.a.j.runtime imports with fully qualified class names
creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
